column1: apoc.export.arrow.all(file, config) - exports whole database as arrow to the provided file
apoc.export.arrow.data(nodes,rels,file,config) - exports given nodes and relationships as csv to the provided file
apoc.export.arrow.graph(graph,file,config) - exports given graph object as arrow to the provided file
apoc.export.arrow.query(query,file,{config,...,params:\{params}}) - exports results from the cypher statement as arrow to the provided file
